Well seeing that the only open beta available is in Japan they should already know its in Japanese... But here is a site with guides to pretty much everything anyone needs in the game...

http://bumped.org/psublog/pso2-guide-list/

Have fun...

P.s. All the English speaking people are on ship 2 and usually on block 20, 21, or 22
Also keep in mind that an unofficial english patch is in the works just like the closed beta version. I will link that when I see that its available.
this torrent was added to demonoid with guides, pics, and more. search Defeat-broomop-edition
